import { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Logo from '../../assets/logo-pb.png' import Fundo from "../../assets/fundo-login.jpg" import './style.css' import SaltPassword from '../../services/md5'; function Login(){ const[email, setEmail] = useState(''); return <>

{email}

Peça seu delivery agora mesmo.

setEmail(e.target)} className='form-control' id='floatingInput' placeholder='E-mail'/>

} export default Login;
